metadata.title: CVE-2024-35848 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:eeprom: at24: fix memory corruption race conditionIf the eeprom is not accessible, an nvmem device will be registered, theread will fail, and the device will be torn down. If another driveraccesses the nvmem device after the teardown, it will referenceinvalid memory.Move the failure point before registering the nvmem device.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
